title: Entangled Minds: Quantum Equations for Multimodal LLMs
description: This paper delves into quantum equations for multimodal LLMs blending vision 📸, audio 🔊, and text 📝. It covers feature encoding, entanglement-based fusion 🔗, and quantum neural layers 🧠. Implemented in Qiskit, it includes optimization techniques for training ⚙️. A gateway to advanced AI harnessing quantum computing 🌌.
